meaningMnemonic: You put a <radical>stone</radical> into a <radical>wrap</radical> of some kind. This wrap happens to be a <kanji>cannon</kanji>, and you're shooting off the stone, just like I used to do to boats with the cannon we had growing up for some reason.
readingMnemonic: You aim the <kanji>cannon</kanji> at your own <reading>ho</reading>me (ほう). You don't want to have a home anymore, you want to become a pirate, live on a boat, and (of course) shoot cannons all day long.
